Greetings to President of Botswana 
    Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sept. 24 sent a message of greetings to Festus G. Mogae, President of Botswana, on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president, the government and the people of Botswana on this anniversary.    
 In the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his work and the people of Botswana progress and well-being.

Greetings to Chinese FM 
    Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Chinese Foreign Minister Tang Jiaxuan on the occasion of the 53rd birthday of the People's Republic of China.
 The message said that the fraternal Chinese people have achieved great successes in the socialist modernization drive and in external affairs under the leadership of the Communist Party of China headed by Jiang Zemin.    
 Noting that the friendship between the DPRK and China continues to develop favorably even under the complicated international situation, the message expressed the hope that the cooperation between the two countries and the two foreign ministries would steadily grow stronger in the future, too, to put the friendly relations between the two countries on a higher level in conformity with the deep care and intentions of the two leaders and wished the PRC prosperity.

Greetings to Nigerian President
    Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sept. 27 sent a message of greetings to Olusegun Obasanjo, Nigerian President and commander-in-chief of the armed forces, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 The message warmly congratulated the president, the government and the people of Nigeria on this anniversary.    
 It wished the president and the people of Nigeria greater success in their work for building a peaceful, prosperous and powerful country through national unity and solidarity and achieving regional peace and stability, and expressed belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger.

Greetings to President of Cyprus
    Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Glafcos Clerides, President of Cyprus, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 The message warmly congratulated the president, the government and the people of Cyprus on this anniversary.    
 It sincerely wished the president and people of Cyprus new success in their work for the peaceful settlement of the Cypriot issue and the prosperity of the country.
